item.title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
item.description: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

item.title: Gold rebounds above $5,000 after US downs Iran drone
item.description: Precious metal price voliatility continues as geopolitical tensions push investors to safe-haven assets.

item.title: Snooker legend John Virgo dies aged 79
item.description: John Virgo, who co-presented TV show Big Break and was a popular BBC commentator for decades, has died.

item.title: Snooker legend Virgo dies aged 79
item.description: John Virgo, who co-presented TV show Big Break and was a popular BBC commentator for decades, has died.

item.title: 'Finally got him to go today': Mandelson's emails to Epstein on Gordon Brown
item.description: Emails released by the US appear to shed new light on the dying days of Gordon Brown's government.
